title: [转载]Minecraft PE0.9.0将会在4月14日(下周一)发布
author: renyunzhong
txt_content:
大消息，我们盼了N久的Minecraft PE0.9.0将会在4月14日发布，也就是下周一。原帖：
Ask the Pocket Edition devs (almost) anythingby Owen on April 9, 2014Q
Greetings!This Monday, Minecraft: Pocket Edition developers Johan, Tommaso and Jens will star in a panel broadcast live from the Mojang office. What will they be discussing? That’s up to you.We’re hoping to harness the collective power of our Pocket Edition players to submit questions to this reddit thread. Then we’ll pick the best ones and put them to the team live on air. We’re not sure of the exact time we’ll be streaming yet, but don’t worry if you miss the live show; the archived footage will be uploaded later on.This is all in celebration of hitting over 20m sales of Pocket Edition just a few days ago. As I mentioned in the Xbox 360 Edition post, we’re extremely grateful to all players for your dedication and creativity. Without that, Minecraft wouldn’t be anywhere near as significant as it is today.So yeah, head to the reddit thread and submit your questions! Then check back on Monday for the live stream/archived footage!Have a good day,
转自：MOJANG信息来源：Minecraft微博

replies.author: 暗夜卐魅影
replies.txt_content:
问候！
本星期一，Minecraft：袖珍版开发商约翰，Tommaso和延斯将会在面板直播从Mojang公司的明星。他们将讨论什么？那就随便你.
我们希望利用我们的口袋版玩家集体的力量来提交问题这个Reddit螺纹。然后我们会挑选最好的，把他们在直播团队。我们还不知道确切的时间我们会流，但不要担心，如果你错过了直播；存档画面将被上传后。
这都是在打了超过2000万销售的袖珍版就在前几天的庆祝活动。当我在Xbox 360版的帖子中，我们为您奉献和创造力的球员非常感激。没有，Minecraft不会接近显着今天。
所以，头到Reddit线程和提交您的问题！然后检查在星期一直播/存档的录像！
有一个美好的一天，
